en-fr.description:
Giga-word corpus for French-English from WMT2010 collected by Chris Callison-Burch
2 languages, total number of files: 452
total number of tokens: 1.43G
total number of sentence fragments: 47.55M
en-fr.citation: J. Tiedemann, 2012, Parallel Data, Tools and Interfaces in OPUS. In Proceedings of the 8th International Conference on Language Resources and Evaluation (LREC 2012)
